ygData.subject: Re: Level 47 Song
ygData.msgSnippet: ... I looked hard for this, but never saw evidence of it. ... Camping king in lower guk, group was: warrior monk enchanter druid bard and one other (that
ygData.messageBody:
On Thu, 18 Feb 1999, Andy Simpson wrote:

> 3) Gives small rune against casters (haven't determined exact value yet,
> must do more testing)

I looked hard for this, but never saw evidence of it.

> Better still, between battles if you really must be the healer at that
> level, it stacks with Hymn of Restoration as well.

Camping king in lower guk, group was: warrior monk enchanter druid bard
and one other (that switched a lot). Utilizing Niv's along with Hymn and
Kelin's Seven Stringed Lute, the only healing the druid cast was pack
chloroplast, and instead threw starfires. It takes more button pushing,
but it also makes us a heck of a lot more powerful in small group and
limited class availability situations.

Athren
